name: Tony Toro Construction
overview: Tony Toro Construction, located in the beautiful Santa Barbara area, is proud to claim over 25 years of experience in the home construction industry. Being surrounded by such beautiful towns like Montecito, Ventura, Summerland, and Carpinteria there is no shortage of Santa Barbara homes in need of remodeling. Tony Toro Construction specializes in kitchen and bathroom remodels and additions. Those at Tony Toro Construction take pride in their attention to detail when remodeling. They promise to give their clients nothing but the best by utilizing the finest material and highly skilled craftsmen. Tony Toro states “our commitment to our Clients is to build their homes with Craftsmanship and Beauty. With over 25 years of experience we build with confidence and a ‘can do’ approach”. Serving the Santa Barbara, Montecito, Hope Ranch, Goleta, Ventura, Summerland, Carpinteria, and Santa Ynez area.
